title: I'm tired of "Stomp or be stomped" every game.
body: It's really not fun or interesting to see people just lose their morale, and hyper carries just being legendary and the game is over before 25 minutes.  I feel so much apathy in the game whenever it's like this

replies.body: I had a normal game last night that actually went back and forth a couple times and then eventually ended with a full-on teamfight over drake. It was uncertain who'd win because both teams had an inhib down. It was great and i decided to go to bed afterwards because i knew there'll be around 50 matches until my next evenly matched, close game.
i been a firm believer that riot scripted an algorithm to put the winners with losers every so often to help "carry" their *** so they can get a win and beach less often.

Remember when the type of champion you played mattered to your team? And everything was a shared effort?
Remember when only ADCs could pick off targets within seconds but were even squishy against a tank?

#Remember when combos dominated the meta, not skills or damage?
